Gensokyo:CrescentMoonSlash.NAME: Crescent Moon Slash
Gensokyo:CrescentMoonSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If this kills an enemy, repeat this effect.

Gensokyo:MissMary.NAME: Miss Mary
Gensokyo:MissMary.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

Gensokyo:SpontaneousHumanCombustion.NAME: Spontaneous Human Combustion
Gensokyo:SpontaneousHumanCombustion.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL At the end of your turn, take !Gensokyo:SecondMagic! damage and increase the damage you will take from this power by !Gensokyo:SecondMagic!.

Gensokyo:RedCapeBlueCape.NAME: Red Cape Blue Cape
Gensokyo:RedCapeBlueCape.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Add gensokyo:Red_Cape and gensokyo:Blue_Cape to your hand.
Gensokyo:RedCapeBlueCape.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Add gensokyo:Red_Cape+ and gensokyo:Blue_Cape+ to your hand.

Gensokyo:RedCape.NAME: Red Cape
Gensokyo:RedCape.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

Gensokyo:BlueCape.NAME: Blue Cape
Gensokyo:BlueCape.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

Gensokyo:TekeTeke.NAME: Teke Teke
Gensokyo:TekeTeke.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !Gensokyo:SecondMagic! times to ALL enemies. NL If this brings an enemy below half HP, increase this card's damage by !M! this combat.

Gensokyo:HAARP.NAME: HAARP
Gensokyo:HAARP.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Channel !M! Lightning.

Gensokyo:MenInBlack.NAME: Men in Black
Gensokyo:MenInBlack.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! Intangible. NL Exhaust.

Gensokyo:LittleGreenMen.NAME: Little Green Men
Gensokyo:LittleGreenMen.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]. NL Put a copy of this card on top of your draw pile.
Gensokyo:LittleGreenMen.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain [E]. NL Put a copy of this card on top of your draw pile.

Gensokyo:TurboGranny.NAME: Turbo Granny
Gensokyo:TurboGranny.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Gain !Gensokyo:SecondMagic! Plated Armor.

Gensokyo:MonkeysPaw.NAME: Monkey's Paw
Gensokyo:MonkeysPaw.DESCRIPTION: Lose half of your current HP. NL Gain !M! Gold for each HP lost this way. NL Exhaust.

Gensokyo:ManorOfTheDishes.NAME: Manor of the Dishes
Gensokyo:ManorOfTheDishes.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play !Gensokyo:SecondMagic! cards, gain !M! Intangible.

Gensokyo:GapWoman.NAME: Gap Woman
Gensokyo:GapWoman.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

Gensokyo:EightFeetTall.NAME: Eight Feet Tall
Gensokyo:EightFeetTall.DESCRIPTION: Target non-boss enemy dies in !M! turns. NL Exhaust.

Gensokyo:SevenSchoolMysteries.NAME: Seven School Mysteries
Gensokyo:SevenSchoolMysteries.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play !Gensokyo:SecondMagic! cards in a single turn, gain !M! Strength and !M! Dexterity.

Gensokyo:Apocalypse.NAME: Apocalypse
Gensokyo:Apocalypse.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Take !M! damage.

Gensokyo:SlitMouthedWoman.NAME: Slit Mouthed Woman
Gensokyo:SlitMouthedWoman.DESCRIPTION: The next time you are attacked, apply !M! Vulnerable to the attacker. NL The second next time you are attacked, the attacker loses !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

Gensokyo:Frozen.NAME: Frozen!
Gensokyo:Frozen.DESCRIPTION: When this card is drawn, reduce its cost by !M! this combat. NL Exhaust.

Gensokyo:MarisaTwilightSpark.NAME: Twilight Spark
Gensokyo:MarisaTwilightSpark.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust any number of cards. Increase this card's damage by !M! for each card exhausted. Counts as a Skill. NL Amplify  [E]  [E]  [E] : Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies instead. Counts as an Attack.

Gensokyo:BlessingOfVigor.NAME: Blessing of Vigor
Gensokyo:BlessingOfVigor.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Whenever you draw this card, draw a card and gain !M! gensokyo:Vigor.

Gensokyo:BlessingOfFortitude.NAME: Blessing of Fortitude
Gensokyo:BlessingOfFortitude.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Whenever you draw this card, draw a card and gain !M! gensokyo:Fortitude.

Gensokyo:BlessingOfConstitution.NAME: Blessing of Constitution
Gensokyo:BlessingOfConstitution.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Whenever you draw this card, draw a card and gain !M! gensokyo:Sturdy.

Gensokyo:Doppelganger.NAME: Doppelganger
Gensokyo:Doppelganger.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Scry X. NL Your next X cards are played twice.
Gensokyo:Doppelganger.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Scry X + 1. NL Your next X + 1 cards are played twice.
